reqs:
Pre-reqs: One of CHEM 111, CHEM 121, SCIE 001.
Restricted seats for MAJ EOSC students.
description: Introduction to crystallography, physical and chemical properties of minerals. Recognition and identification of common minerals. Please consult the Faculty of Science Credit Exclusion List: www.students.ubc.ca/calendar/index.cfm?tree=12,215,410,414.
